https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dfeSAyqdPOPJIes9DVk8JgUlH1o.jpg Within the Contractor underground, intrigue and murder surround a stolen chemical. When the pages of Otsuka's work reveal details that point to the coveted substance, BK201 might be forced to write the final chapter of the young author's tale. Darker than Black: Beneath Cherry Blossoms in Full Bloom...
